description: This CSS file defines style variables for both light and dark themes, as well as styles for various components such as the App, App header, and theme toggle button.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container with styles for background color, text alignment, and height.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Style for the application logo including animation and size adjustments.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header styles for the application with layout configurations.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for links within the application, emphasizing color transitions.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the theme toggle button, including positioning and hover effects.
